nodes.text: Bonion was a male leader on the planet of Obinipor. On 7 ABY, Obinipor was neutral to the ongoing Galactic Civil War. Warlord Zsinj intended to force the planet in joining him by having one of his ships, the CR90 corvette Night Caller, fly two of its TIE/LN starfighters and buzz Obinipor's largest corporate headquarters.
